meta.description: Fisheries Management Corporation is committed to protecting your personal data. Review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and safeguard your information in compliance with applicable regulations.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: At Fisheries Management Corporation, we prioritize the privacy and security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices for collecting, using, storing, and sharing your data in accordance with applicable data protection laws, including GDPR and other relevant regulations.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.text: We collect information necessary to provide our services and ensure compliance with fisheries management regulations. This includes data you provide directly and information generated through your interaction with our platform.

items.personal: Personal data such as name, email address, phone number, and national ID provided during registration or account management.
items.usage: Usage data, including fisheries-related activities, log entries, and platform interactions, to enhance our services.
items.technical: Technical data, such as IP addresses, browser types, and device information, to ensure system security and performance.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.text: Your information is used to deliver, maintain, and improve our fisheries management platform while ensuring compliance with legal and regulatory obligations.

items.service: To provide and personalize our services, including user authentication and fisheries data management.
items.security: To protect the security and integrity of our platform, including fraud prevention and blockchain-based record verification.
items.compliance: To comply with legal obligations, such as reporting to regulatory authorities and maintaining auditable records.

dataSharing.title: Sharing Your Information
dataSharing.text: We do not sell or rent your personal information. Data may be shared under specific circumstances to support our operations or meet legal requirements.

items.partners: With trusted third-party service providers (e.g., cloud hosting, blockchain services) bound by strict confidentiality agreements.
items.legal: With regulatory authorities or law enforcement when required by law or to protect our legal rights.
items.consent: With your explicit consent for specific purposes, such as data analytics partnerships.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.text: You have rights regarding your personal data under applicable data protection laws. We are committed to facilitating the exercise of these rights.

items.access: Request access to the personal data we hold about you.
items.rectification: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
items.deletion: Request deletion of your data, subject to legal retention obligations.

security.title: Data Security
security.text: We implement robust technical and organizational measures, including encryption, access controls, and blockchain technology, to safeguard your data against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: For inquiries regarding this Privacy Policy or to exercise your data rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer at
